Mendokusai

Tartarus

NYC todo

14 Mar 2019

Having finally got my act together enough to book accomodation for my trip to New York next month, I am fully back aboard the excitement express. So, here is a non-exhaustive list of things that are on my mini-bucket list for the city:

  • Eat an authentic NYC bagel
  • Eat authentic NYC pizza
  • Eat authentic NYC cheesecake
  • Go to a Knicks game
  • Go floating
  • See Plini
  • Play chess in Central Park
  • Take a contrived selfie in Times Square
  • Visit the 9/11 Memorial and Museum
  • Cross Brooklyn Bridge
  • Visit MoMA
  • See the Statue of Liberty
